Translations.Text: wakayfa takfuruna wa-antum tut'la ʿalaykum ayatu l-lahi wafikum rasuluhu waman yaʿtasim bil-lahi faqad hudiya ila siratin mus'taqimin
yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu l-laha haqqa tuqatihi wala tamutunna illa wa-antum mus'limuna

wa-iʿ'tasimu bihabli l-lahi jamiʿan wala tafarraqu wa-udh'kuru niʿ'mata l-lahi ʿalaykum idh kuntum aʿdaan fa-allafa bayna qulubikum fa-asbahtum biniʿ'matihi ikh'wanan wakuntum ʿala shafa huf'ratin mina l-nari fa-anqadhakum min'ha kadhalika yubayyinu l-lahu lakum ayatihi laʿallakum tahtaduna
waltakun minkum ummatun yadʿuna ila l-khayri wayamuruna bil-maʿrufi wayanhawna ʿani l-munkari wa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
wala takunu ka-alladhina tafarraqu wa-ikh'talafu min baʿdi ma jaahumu l-bayinatu wa-ulaika lahum ʿadhabun ʿazimun
yawma tabyaddu wujuhun wataswaddu wujuhun fa-amma alladhina is'waddat wujuhuhum akafartum baʿda imanikum fadhuqu l-ʿadhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
wa-amma alladhina ib'yaddat wujuhuhum fafi rahmati l-lahi hum fiha khaliduna
til'ka ayatu l-lahi natluha ʿalayka bil-haqi wama l-lahu yuridu zul'man lil'ʿalamina
